overview: Sagar is responsible for maintaining existing relationships with Socialcast’s current client base, acting as a liaison between engineers and client-side project managers. He works closely with the client to ensure consistent communication, project updates and overall satisfaction. Prior to joining Socialcast, Sagar was a co-founder of 3patti.com, the first internet gaming company geared towards the East Indian market. After managing the day-to-day operations of the organization for 2 years, Sagar and his partner organized the sale of 3patti.com to a large internet gaming conglomerate in November 2006.
